metadata.name: H2WW Geometric Logo & Brand Identity System
metadata.description: Bauhaus-inspired visual identity using geometric learning metaphors
metadata.philosophy: Form follows function - geometry serves learning psychology

geometricMetaphors.circle: Continuous learning journey, AI companion presence, infinite potential
geometricMetaphors.square: Stable knowledge foundation, reliable tools, structured learning
geometricMetaphors.triangle: Growth progression, skill advancement, breakthrough moments

primary.description: Full logo with geometric elements and wordmark
primary.usage: Primary brand application, hero sections, official documents

compact.usage: Social media, favicons, app icons, compact headers

circle.application: AI companion avatar, progress indicators, user profiles
circle.colorAssociation: Primary blue for trust and reliability

square.application: Content blocks, tool cards, structured information
square.colorAssociation: Secondary colors for different tool categories

triangle.application: Progress arrows, level indicators, achievement badges
triangle.colorAssociation: Primary red for motivation and achievement

brandVoice.personality: Knowledgeable guide, supportive mentor, trusted companion
brandVoice.tone: Professional yet approachable, confident but humble

Perfect for mobile apps, favicons, and small digital applications. Maintains brand recognition at 16px and larger.
For watermarks, loading states, pattern backgrounds, and contexts where wordmark isn't needed.

The circle represents the infinite nature of learning and the continuous presence of AI in our lives. It symbolizes completeness, unity, and the ongoing relationship between human and artificial intelligence.
â€¢ AI Companion avatars â€¢ Progress indicators â€¢ User profile images â€¢ Loading states â€¢ Completion badges â€¢ Infinite scroll elements

The square represents stability, reliability, and structured learning. It embodies the solid foundation of knowledge that users build as they master AI tools and concepts. Order, organization, and dependable structure.
â€¢ Content blocks â€¢ Tool cards â€¢ Information panels â€¢ Grid systems â€¢ Course modules â€¢ Knowledge base articles â€¢ Stable UI elements

The triangle symbolizes direction, advancement, and breakthrough moments in learning. It represents the energy of progress, the excitement of leveling up, and the dynamic nature of skill acquisition in AI mastery.
â€¢ Progress arrows â€¢ Level up indicators â€¢ Achievement badges â€¢ Call-to-action buttons â€¢ Skill advancement â€¢ Breakthrough moments â€¢ Dynamic elements
Highly legible text for learning content. Neutral and professional appearance. Optimized for screens and reading comprehension.

"Ready to master AI? I'm here to guide you every step of the way. Let's start with the basics and build your confidence together."
"Great progress! You've mastered prompt basics. Ready to explore advanced techniques? I'll show you how professionals use AI."
"Every expert was once a beginner. Your curiosity about AI is already your greatest asset. Let's build on that together."
